column2:
"Oh, don't mind me. I was just watching
in hopes of gleaning a few new moves
from you."

"It seems you have more than just keen senses
in your arsenal. Strength, skill, finesse...
you have it all in spades."

"It's a comfort to know there are people like
you in our little organization. Although...
"

"Ah, pardon me. I'd neglected to mention it,
but I'm an ARKS operative as well, nominally."

"We're on the same team, generally speaking.
There's no cause to get defensive."
"Besides, I think I've seen enough. Good-bye."

"……あ、おかまいなく。
戦闘機動の参考になればと
観察していただけですから。"

"しかし……なるほど。
感覚の鋭敏さだけでなく、その他の
能力も非常に高くまとまっている……"

"同じアークスとしては心強い
ですが……"

"……あ、申し上げていませんでしたね。
わたしも一応アークスです。"

"基本的には、わたしとあなたは
仲間という枠に入ります。
ですから、警戒は無用ですよ。"
